data.name: Data centric strategies for enterprises - is your data in the right place with the right performance and protection
data.summary: How critical is your data to your business? How will your business be impacted if you donâ€™t have access to your data where and when you need it? Imagine the revenue impact if you lost an hour, a day, a week, or all of your data!
